nodes.text: Coruscant police sector 417 was a sector of the planet Coruscant in the waning years of the Galactic Republic that was identified by the Coruscant Security Force as a specific police precinct's jurisdiction.

Around 22 BBY, police speeders assigned to that sector gave chase to Senator Padmé Amidala when she stole a speeder bike to get away from two bounty hunters Robonino and Chata Hyoki. Later, police droids from Sector 417 also responded to the Republic Executive Building to assist the Alderaan Guard who were defending Senator Bail Prestor Organa from an attack by the same bounty hunters.
Coruscant police sector 417 first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode Pursuit of Peace. Police Sector 417 was written on the side of the police speeders that appeared in that episode.
